alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 4:43PM EDT until May 03 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Calhoun County in central South Carolina... West central Sumter County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 442 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gadsden, or near McEntire Air Base, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... McEntire Air Base, Eastover, Gadsden, Congaree National Park, Wedgewood, Fort Jackson McCrady Training Center and Stateburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
